name: Golden Mix Tournament
description:
Español: Golden Mix Tournament es un juego de peleas realizado en M.U.G.E.N. tratandose de un "M.U.G.E.N. Full Game" recopilación de varios personajes, escenarios, y musica. Durante el juego tomarás el control de los peleadores asignados, siendo la luchadora principal Hatsune Miku la cual hizo la unión de varios universos tras que se uniera su poderoza voz junto con una energía misteriosa.

English:  Golden Mix Tournament is a fighting game made in M.U.G.E.N. being a "M.U.G.E.N. Full Game" compilation of several characters, scenarios, and music. During the game you will take control of the assigned fighters, being the main fighter Hatsune Miku which made the union of several universes after her powerful voice was joined together with a mysterious energy.
